name: Pip The Gladiator
description:
This is a WIP stable build of our iOS game, Pip The Gladiator (initially titled Pip Arena or Pip Run).

Let us know what you think of the idea, we greatly appreciate feedback and comments - hello@coinflipstudios.com / waiyin@hotmail.my

If you like our game, consider paying the minimum price to support us a little. :)

CONTROLS:

Since this is meant for mobile device, everything is playable with only the mouse. Drag-and-drop cards onto targets (or floor) to use them.

Programming: WY Leong (http://wyleong.tumblr.com)

Art: Mok (http://monosattva.tumblr.com)
